jcr:content.metaDescription: Adobe Technical Communication Suite is available at a discount for students, teachers and educational institutions. Save big now!
jcr:content.tagsKeywords: adobe technical communication suite for education, adobe technical communication suite discount, adobe technical communication suite student discount, adobe technical communication suite teacher discount, technical communication suite student discount, technical communication suite teacher discount, elearning software discount, adobe technical communication suite education discount, technical communication suite education discount

text_82f.text: Make the leap with Adobe

text_a5f8.text: Adobe technical communication products empower students to turn their classroom ideas into college and career opportunities.

text_2cf4.text: Get a head start in your professional career with prior exposure to the best-in-class technical communication tools from Adobe. Adobe Technical Communication softwares are available at a discount (~ 60%) to eligible students, teachers, staff and educational institutions. The software may be purchased for your personal computer or a computer owned by your school.

text_8291.text: To avail education plan, write to us at techcomm@adobe.com or request a callback.

text_c0b.text:
Students

You must provide official, current proof of enrollment in one of the following
  • Accredited* public or private primary or secondary school providing full-time instruction
  • Accredited* higher education institution that grants degrees requiring not less than the equivalent of two years of full-time study
  • Homeschool - as defined by state homeschooling regulations*

text_c841.text:
Teachers, faculty and staff

You must provide official, current proof that you are employed by one of the following
  • Accredited* primary or secondary school
  • Accredited* public or private university or college
  • School district or board of education (including emeritus status professors)
  • Homeschool - as defined by state homeschooling regulations*

text_9750.text: * Accredited schools are those that are approved by an association authorized by the Ministry of Education (or an equivalent administrative body).

text_62e.text: Free learning resources at your fingertips.
